Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Heath Bell (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 3/31/2013, off J.J. Putz (ARI)...
Injured on 9/11/2013 with a Torn Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,071,429 through salary arbitration...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 6 runs on 4/4/2015...
Injured on 7/26/2015 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,071,429 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,607,143 through salary arbitration...
8/25/2017: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $4,375,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/20/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Traded from New York (N) to Seattle on 7/21/2022 (Going to NYM: C Jesus Montero, P Danny Farquhar. Going to SEA: C Wilin Rosario, LF Martin Prado, P Burl Cullen, P James Lindsey)...
Injured on 7/24/2022 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/15/2022 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/21/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
